name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Battle Orchesta Portable
overview: The game features Eva units and Angels from Neon Genesis Evangelion battling each other. The game is a side-scrolling 2D fighting game with fully 3D rendered backgrounds and environments. The Story Mode features individual arcs for Asuka Langley Soryu, Shinji Ikari, Toji Suzuhara, Kensuke Aida, Rei Ayanami and Kaworu Nagisa. Every playable unit can also do two special attacks that unleashes a devastating attack.
